WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 26 DEC
   BY M/V VANTAGE TOWING SIX 155 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-30.87S 042-50.83W, 24-36.10S 042-48.05W,
   24-24.40S 042-20.97W, 24-18.97S 042-23.90W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3876/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 27 DEC 18.
